Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Board
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
Class to manage all the Tiles and to access them. It is also responsible for the removal of a player

    • getAvailableMoveTiles

      public java.util.List<Tile> getAvailableMoveTiles​(Worker selectedWorker)
      List of possible Tiles for the current Player to move onto with his selected worker, when he chooses Action.MOVE
      Parameters:
      selectedWorker - Worker that is going to move
      Returns:
      The list is created checking that each of the 's adjacent tiles are free to move onto; such conditions are verified through the call of legalMove on Player

    • getAvailableBuildTiles

      public java.util.List<Tile> getAvailableBuildTiles​(Worker selectedWorker)
      List of possible Tiles for the current Player to build on with his selected worker, when he chooses Action.MOVE
      Parameters:
      selectedWorker - Worker that is going to build
      Returns:
      The list is created checking that each of the {}'s adjacent tiles are free to build on; such conditions are verified through the call of legalBuild on Player
